Sentencas: Undoped and 1-10 wt% aluminum titanate, Al2TiO5, (ALT) doped nickel oxide/yttria-stabilized zirconia (NiO/YSZ) anode materials were kinetically evaluated during isothermal (800 degrees C) H-2 reduction (5% H-2-95% N-2 and pure H-2 gas).
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: It was found that the two parameter Avrami-Erofe'ev model (AEn) was the most successful in representing reduction kinetics.
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The reduction mechanisms have been identified as the formation and growth of nuclei and is maintained after aluminum titanate, Al2TiO5, (ALT) doping
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: and when the Hy concentration in the gas flow is increased.
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: ALT doped samples result in the formation of NiAl2O4; which, when present in sufficient amounts, slowly reduces causing a shift of the model from the experimental data.
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: This phenomenon has been correlated, through microstructural evaluation, to the formation of Ni nanoparticles.
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: In all investigated cases, the reduction kinetics of the system was accelerated when the H-2 concentration was increased from 5% to 100%.
Titulo: Reduction kinetics of undoped and aluminum titanate (Al2TiO5) doped NiO-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anodes
